subject: Control Box Issues
description_text:
Recently ordered the Pro X Ultra pedals and they seem to be working fine.
However, the control box appears to have an issue. I only have the 3 pedals
connected but input 4 is continuously being depressed. See attached clip of
only the control box connected to the PC. Pedals are disconnected but get
the same results with them connected. .

conversations.body_text: Hi Alkoholism,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.
